data.text: @Jonboywell @rosey_nz @nzherald @jonboywell I'm not even going to engage with you!
@Jonboywell @LieselThorn @rosey_nz @nzherald The responsible thing to do would be to listen to official health advice re mandates, no?

@MichelleWatt10 @nzherald Hanging a noose & making death threats is disgusting. The majority have had to listen to you threaten and whinge for weeks. We're done with your gross sense of entitlement over everyone else. Get lost and #gohome

@FreedomKiwi @nzherald Not her job to talk to a vicious, tiny minority who cry about something everyone else got on with, demanding the wishes of the majority are ignored.

Would you talk, let alone roll over,  to a thuggish crowd who said they wanted to hang you? #GoHome
@ReubenBailey @nzherald Sorry already showed our brown shirt sweetheart.
@LieselThorn @Jonboywell @rosey_nz @nzherald Even the ones who drew up the hanging list? Bullcrap.
